text: 33|59|nabiye, ninre patnimareatum putrimareatum satyavisvasikalute strikaleatum avar tannalute mutupatannal tannalutemel talttiyitan parayuka: avar tiriccariyappetuvanum, annane avar salyam ceyyappetatirikkuvanum atan erravum anuyeajyamayatâ€Œ. allahu ere pearukkunnavanum karunanidhiyumakunnu
